refsect1.programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in -odac -iadc ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o prints.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
/* Written by Matt Ingalls, edited by Kevin Conder. */ ; Initialize the global variables. sr = 44100 kr = 4410 ksmps = 10 nchnls = 1
; Instrument #1. instr 1 ; Init-time print. prints "%2.3f\\t%!%!%!%!%!%!semicolons! %%\\n", 1234.56789 endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
/* Written by Matt Ingalls, edited by Kevin Conder. */ ; Play instrument #1. i 1 0 0.004
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
